title: Relicx
description: Introducing Relicx, your Generative AI-powered assistant to ship quality software fast. Create tests in minutes with our no-code interface, powered by cutting-edge AI. Write self-healing intent-driven tests using the natural language. Go beyond functionality—our AI autonomously identifies visual issues across your application for complete coverage. Align your tests with real-world scenarios through user session capture, ensuring the highest quality customer experience.
